imdb.title: Namuamida Butsu! Rendai Utena
imdb.plot: The Thirteen Buddhas along with Taishakuten and Bonten, must confront the evil Mara. Mara seeks revenge against Shaka Nyorai, who had previously saved the world from suffering and conflict by achieving enlightenment.

episodes.title: No Amount of Shooing Can Keep Earthly Vices at Bay
episodes.plot: Taishakuten and Bonten are here to deliver the Earth from evil. But evil takes time to show up, and these two deities need a crash course on the conveniences of modern life.

episodes.title: No Treasure is Worth More than Friendship
episodes.plot: Karuraten is tired of Taishakuten and Bonten's constant bickering, but if he wants to stay in the material world, he'll need help to get the two to behave.

episodes.title: Behold the Flower that Blooms in the Shadow of the Obvious
episodes.plot: Kannon and Seishi are brothers but misunderstandings threaten to drive them apart. Meanwhile, Miroku seeks to prove he's not a kid and finds new friends among senior citizens.

episodes.title: You Can't Fulfill Wishes Without Both Feet on the Ground
episodes.plot: The situation's changed. An ambush by powerful vices means the Thirteen Buddhas must consolidate their strength - but Dainichi hasn't returned from his vacation yet.

episodes.title: One Lie Leads to a Hundred Lies
episodes.plot: Dainichi's overwhelming power is the solution to their escalating situation. However, he's unwilling to return to duty. Why?

episodes.title: If You Are to Forgive Sin Behold the Face of the Sinner
episodes.plot: As the Buddhas split into teams to deal with the increasing threat, Taishakuten and Bonten attempt to lift Shaka's spirits.

episodes.title: You Cannot Return to the Past But You Can Carry on With the Future
episodes.plot: Despite Taishakuten's pleas, the flames of Ashura's wrath refuse to quell. They were once friends, but that is no longer true. What happened in the distant past?

episodes.title: Out of Sight is Different From Gone
episodes.plot: As Taishakuten recovers from his wounds, an enraged Fudo vows to hunt Ashura down. When Fudo goes AWOL, Amida and Bonten must locate him.

episodes.title: Set the Unenlightened Night Aglow With Smiles
episodes.plot: Mara's decisive strike against the shrine yields devastating results. With the halo fragments stolen and Shaka Nyorai captured, the Buddhas' only hope is a cryptic message.

episodes.title: The Fruit Of Doubt Bears No Seed
episodes.plot: As Taiskakuten fends off Ashura's assault, Boten attempts to free Shaka Nyorai. The others rally to save Shinjuku, but how can hope remain when even gods can succumb to vices?

episodes.title: There Can Be No Enlightenment Without Vice
episodes.plot: Mara loses composure as the tide of battle swings in the Buddhas' favor, but nothing is more dangerous than a cornered foe. What will this mean for Shaka Nyorai and Ashura?

episodes.title: Be at Peace with Vice-Prone Souls
episodes.plot: The deities have earned a break after their fierce battle against Mara. Ashura tries to integrate with the team, but can he successfully do so after all that's happened?
